title: The Absolute Favorite in the Apocalyptic Rebirth - Novel Updates
tags: Apocalypse   Betrayal   Cooking   Female Protagonist   Forced into a Relationship   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Obsessive Love   Overpowered Protagonist   Possessive Characters   Psychic Powers   Racism   Reincarnation   Revenge   R*pe   Second Chance   Siblings Not Related by Blood   Special Abilities   Twisted Personality   Zombies
author: Wu Shi Yi   Wu Shiyi   雾矢翊
description:
A month before the end of the world, Lou Dian looked at her with more and more explicit eyes that made her horrified!

Many unexpected things happen in life.

To Lou Ling’s surprise, the end of the world came.

 Lou Dian taught her how to survive in the last days and gave her the most precious food, but his evil intentions were also obvious from the beginning.

 In this apocalypse, Lou Dian completely imprisoned her and became his possession!

 She is like an addictive poison, and when he suddenly looks back, he can’t give up.>
